title: Node infection attribute schema
description: A schema for validating the attributes of nodes in a household branching process model

avenue_of_testing.description: What was the avenue of testing? 0=PCR, 1=LFA

being_lateral_flow_tested.description: Is the node being lateral flow tested?

positive_test_time.description: The time taken to receive a positive test result

taken_confirmatory_pcr_test.description: Has the node taken a confirmatory PCR test?

time_started_LFA_testing.description: The time that the node started LFA testing
